title: The 25 Best-Selling Cars, Trucks, and SUVs of 2019 (So Far)
text: Lists of the best-selling vehicles in America are starting to look somewhat familiar: pickup trucks always occupy the top spots, while compact crossovers have now firmly supplanted family sedans in the top 10. But it's still interesting to follow the rankings throughout the year to see how things shake out. We've tallied sales from every automaker in the U.S. market through the first three-quarters of the year to bring you a list of the top 25 vehicles through September 2019. We'll continue to update this list quarterly to see if there's any movement among the contenders.
